医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
挑战成瘾的慢性脑部疾病模型一项广泛的研究综述表明，成瘾不仅仅是一种慢性脑部疾病，将其视为一种慢性脑部疾病可能会限制治疗选择并增加耻辱感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Challenging-the-chronic-brain-disease-model-of-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Challenging-the-chronic-brain-disease-model-of-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=222acceb-88f7-4a36-9f63-100feac105ca Mon, 01 Jul 2024 08:22:35 -0400 Challenging the chronic brain disease model of addiction
KRISS 开发出世界上第一个用于医学成像中精确体脂肪测量的参考材料韩国标准与科学研究所 (KRISS) 开发了世界上第一个参考材料，以提高通过 MRI 和 CT 扫描进行的身体脂肪测量的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/KRISS-develops-worlds-first-reference-material-for-accurate-body-fat-measurement-in-medical-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/KRISS-develops-worlds-first-reference-material-for-accurate-body-fat-measurement-in-medical-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5443078-1c5d-436a-8518-6e6238d27679 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 08:13:00 -0400 KRISS develops world's first reference material for accurate body fat measurement in medical imaging
研究探讨私募股权收购对心脏病学实践的影响美国心脏病学会旗舰期刊《JACC》今天发表的一项研究显示，在过去十年中，私募股权公司收购了 342 家心脏病诊所，其中超过 94% 发生在 2021 年至 2023 年之间。在巴尔的摩举行的 AcademyHealth 2024 年度研究会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-examines-the-impact-of-private-equity-acquisitions-on-cardiology-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-examines-the-impact-of-private-equity-acquisitions-on-cardiology-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dddd2afd-c69e-487a-9652-1cfcce34b948 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 08:07:35 -0400 Study examines the impact of private equity acquisitions on cardiology practices
亚太地区面临肝炎危机：需要采取紧急行动来实现世卫组织目标一位疾病专家表示，亚太地区国家不太可能兑现到 2030 年消除肝炎的承诺，除非它们像对待 COVID-19 那样宣布进入公共卫生紧急状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Asia-Pacific-faces-hepatitis-crisis-Urgent-action-needed-to-meet-WHO-targets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Asia-Pacific-faces-hepatitis-crisis-Urgent-action-needed-to-meet-WHO-targets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=885a2752-a473-4522-9ed0-f291beadf4c9 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 07:54:12 -0400 Asia Pacific faces hepatitis crisis: Urgent action needed to meet WHO targets
研究发现特定的肠道微生物群特征与食物成瘾的脆弱性有关研究人员最近在《肠道》杂志上发表了一项研究，探讨了肠道微生物在食物成瘾相关过程中的参与。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-finds-specific-gut-microbiota-signature-is-linked-with-vulnerability-to-food-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Study-finds-specific-gut-microbiota-signature-is-linked-with-vulnerability-to-food-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fea3fd0-93db-4969-9f2e-4251c85f2468 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 07:51:00 -0400 Study finds specific gut microbiota signature is associated with vulnerability to food addiction
高分辨率实时成像揭示鹌鹑胚胎的早期发育过程昆士兰大学的研究人员首次实时捕捉早期胚胎发育的图像和视频，以更多地了解先天性出生缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/High-around-real-time-imaging-reveals-early-developmental-processes-in-quail-embryos.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/High-around-real-time-imaging-reveals-early-developmental-processes-in-quail-embryos.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24eef7ce-af0c-40a1-a818-a431c202a99d Mon, 01 Jul 2024 07:48:06 -0400 High-resolution real-time imaging reveals early developmental processes in quail embryos
礼宾服务的陷阱：为少数患者提供更好的服务会扰乱对许多患者的护理“你必须付钱，否则医生就不会再给你看病了。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/The-concierge-catch-Better-access-for-a-few-病人-disrupts-care-for-many.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/The-concierge-catch-Better-access-for-a-few-病人-disrupts-care-for-many.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66dfe6e4-3608-49b1-a393-78057d756225 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 06:53:36 -0400 The concierge catch: Better access for a few patients disrupts care for many
英国冠心病发病率下降 30%，但其他心脏病发病率上升研究人员调查了2000年至2019年英国心血管疾病的总体发病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/UK-coronary-heart-disease-drops-3025-but-other-heart-conditions-rise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/UK-coronary-heart-disease-drops-3025-but-other-heart-conditions-rise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32a7567c-dae4-41d2-80d5-fa9cf3c3a97c Mon, 01 Jul 2024 06:48:00 -0400 UK coronary heart disease drops 30%, but other heart conditions rise
调节性 T 细胞作为大量流动细胞群存在，在体内移动以修复受损组织研究人员调查了各种组织中的调节性 T 细胞（一种白细胞）群体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Regulatory-T-cells-exist-as-large-mobile-population-that-travels-through-body-to-repair-damaging-tissue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Regulatory-T-cells-exist-as-large-mobile-population-that-travels-through-body-to-repair-damaging-tissue.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=562e9e84-21dd-4f6b-95bf-6061bb76c084 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 05:55:00 -0400 Regulatory T cells exist as large, mobile population that travels through body to repair damaged tissue
针灸改善帕金森病患者睡眠质量的疗效观察针灸是否可以改善帕金森病患者的睡眠质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Efficacy-of-acupuncture-in-improving-sleep-quality-for-Parkinsons-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240701/Efficacy-of-acupuncture-in-improving-sleep-quality-for-Parkinsons-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=038c8839-b8bc-4d86-8090-5050d7b91938 Mon, 01 Jul 2024 05:38:00 -0400 Efficacy of acupuncture in improving sleep quality for Parkinson's patients
